seo.description: GlamBot Hire Sydney and Melbourne. Give Your Guests An Experience They’ll Never Forget. Cinematic Slow-Motion Video. Professional On-Site Attendant.

contentHtml:
GLAMBOT Hire

SYDNEY | MELBOURNE | BRISBANE

ONEGLAM GlamBot
Ultimate Video Experience

Take your videos to the next level and your vision to life. Capture memories to last a lifetime with more than just a photo.

Book Today

With state-of-the-art camera technology, professional lighting, and sleek set designs, ONEGLAM transforms any event into a VIP experience. Our team of experts curates every detail, from seamless setup to real-time video processing, so guests can walk away with stunning, instantly shareable content.

Hire GlamBot in Sydney, Melbourne, & Brisbane

ONEGLAM is the ultimate video booth experience, designed to capture high-energy, cinematic slow-motion moments at corporate events, brand activations, and private celebrations.

Inspired by Hollywood-style glamour, ONEGLAM delivers premium slow-motion video captures with a luxury, high-end feel, creating eye-catching content that guests can instantly share.

The ONEGLAM Experience: Capture, Create, Share

ONEGLAM Photo Booth Hire in Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane

Effortless, exciting, and instantly shareable—ONEGLAM makes capturing your favourite moments seamless. With our high-tech setup and professional team, we ensure a smooth and engaging experience from start to finish. Here’s how we turn every guest into a star:

Capture

Guests strike their best poses in front of the ONEGLAM setup.

Create

Our robotic arm smoothly films in cinematic slow-motion.

Share

Videos are instantly sent via SMS, email, or social media.

Features & Benefits

video experience
for all events.

Social Media Integration

Let’s create something cool and fun with our ONEGLAM.

Hire GlamBot in Sydney, Melbourne, & Brisbane

Give your guests an unforgettable experience with high-end, cinematic slow-motion videos they can instantly share. Whether it’s a corporate event, brand activation, or private celebration, ONEGLAM adds a touch of Hollywood glamour to every moment.

Book ONEGLAM today and give your guests an experience they’ll never forget.

Contact us now to bring the Hollywood spotlight to your next event. Read how hiring a GlamBot can instantly elevate the atmosphere of your event.

Customised Experience for All

ONEGLAM Photo Booth Hire in Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane

FAQs.

What is a GlamBot, and how does it work?

A GlamBot is a cutting-edge, high-speed robotic camera system that captures stunning, slow-motion, cinematic videos of your guests at events. Originally made famous on Hollywood red carpets and major award shows, GlamBots offer a unique and interactive experience where the robotic camera arm smoothly glides around guests, capturing dramatic 360-degree and close-up shots in ultra-high-definition. These captivating slow-motion clips are then professionally edited on-site and delivered directly to guests for instant social media sharing. Whether you’re hosting a glamorous corporate gala, brand activation, wedding, or private celebration, GlamBot hire in Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane is the perfect way to elevate your event and leave a lasting impression.

Why should I choose GlamBot Hire in Sydney for my event?

Choosing GlamBot hire in Sydney for your next event guarantees an unforgettable, celebrity-style experience for your guests. It adds a touch of luxury and high-energy excitement, creating stunning slow-motion videos that are perfect for social media content, marketing campaigns, and personal keepsakes. Our expert team ensures a smooth setup, professional lighting, customised video branding, and real-time delivery of the clips. Whether you’re planning a corporate awards night, fashion show, private party, or product launch, GlamBot hire in Sydney is the ultimate entertainment feature to make your event stand out. We also proudly offer GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane, bringing the same high-quality, cinematic experience to events across Australia.

How much does GlamBot Hire in Sydney cost?

The cost of GlamBot hire in Sydney can vary based on several factors including the event’s duration, location, number of guests, and customisation requirements like branded overlays, special effects, or bespoke backdrops. We offer flexible packages designed to suit everything from intimate private gatherings to large-scale corporate events. To receive a tailored quote for your event in Sydney, Melbourne, or Brisbane, simply contact our team with your event details, and we’ll provide a transparent, customised pricing plan that delivers outstanding value for your special occasion.

Is GlamBot Hire in Sydney suitable for all event types?

Yes — one of the greatest advantages of GlamBot hire in Sydney is its versatility. Our GlamBot hire services are perfect for an extensive range of events including weddings, product launches, brand activations, awards ceremonies, private parties, fashion shows, media events, and corporate galas. We also regularly provide GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane, making it easy for clients across Australia to access this premium entertainment option. No matter the theme or venue, our GlamBot setup adds a dynamic, interactive, and visually stunning element that guests love.

How quickly do guests receive their GlamBot videos?

One of the standout features of GlamBot hire in Sydney is the instant gratification it offers guests. After capturing their Hollywood-style slow-motion video, guests receive their professionally edited clip via SMS, email, or direct social media upload within minutes. This fast turnaround ensures your guests can share their GlamBot moments on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and other platforms in real-time, generating buzz and excitement for your event. The same speedy service is available with our GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane packages.

Can I customise my GlamBot videos with branding?

Absolutely! One of the key benefits of our GlamBot hire in Sydney service is the wide range of custom branding options available. From integrating your company’s logo, event hashtag, or campaign graphics to incorporating themed overlays, special effects, and music tracks, we can tailor the GlamBot experience to perfectly match your event’s aesthetic and branding. Customisation is also a popular request for clients using our GlamBot hire services in Melbourne and Brisbane, where brand visibility and event engagement are equally important.

What space and setup requirements are needed for a GlamBot photo booth?

Our GlamBot hire in Sydney setup is both efficient and adaptable, typically requiring a stable, flat area of approximately 3m x 3m to allow the robotic camera arm to move safely and smoothly around guests. Professional lighting, optional backdrops, and power access are also part of the setup. Our experienced crew handles the full installation and pack-down process, ensuring a seamless experience from start to finish. If you’re looking to book GlamBot hire in Melbourne or Brisbane, our team will work with your venue to confirm all technical and space requirements ahead of your event day.

How do I book GlamBot Hire in Sydney for my event?

Booking your GlamBot hire in Sydney is easy and hassle-free. Simply reach out to our friendly team via phone, email, or our website enquiry form, providing details about your event location, date, duration, and any customisation preferences. We’ll respond promptly with a tailored package and quote. Whether you need GlamBot hire in Sydney, Melbourne, or Brisbane, our team is ready to deliver a premium, cinematic video experience your guests will remember.

How long can I hire a GlamBot for my Sydney event?

We offer flexible hire options for GlamBot hire in Sydney, with packages ranging from a few hours to a full day or evening event. Whether you’re planning a short product launch activation or an all-night celebration, we’ll customise a hire duration to suit your needs. The same flexibility is available for our GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane services, making it easy for clients nationwide to add a touch of glamour to their event on their own terms.

Is GlamBot Hire available outside of Sydney?

Yes — while we are renowned for our GlamBot hire in Sydney, we also proudly service events in Melbourne and Brisbane. No matter which city you’re in, our mobile team can deliver the same professional-grade equipment, expert operators, and instant video production services. Whether you’re hosting an awards night in Melbourne, a wedding in Brisbane, or a corporate launch in Sydney, our GlamBot hire services are available Australia-wide.

Can I preview previous GlamBot videos before hiring?

Of course! We encourage potential clients to view our portfolio of past GlamBot hire in Sydney events to see firsthand the quality, creativity, and cinematic results we deliver. You’ll find a diverse range of videos from weddings, product launches, corporate galas, and fashion shows. Additionally, we’re happy to share highlights from our GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane events, giving you a clear idea of the Hollywood-style experience you can expect at your own event.

Does GlamBot Hire Sydney include lighting and backdrops?

Yes — when you book our GlamBot hire in Sydney service, you’ll receive a complete setup that includes professional-grade lighting to ensure every slow-motion video looks crisp, cinematic, and social media-ready. We also offer optional backdrop enhancements that can be customised to match your event’s branding, theme, or corporate colours. The same premium package inclusions are available for our GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane, ensuring consistently high-quality results, no matter the location.

Can GlamBot videos include music or special effects?

Absolutely! Our GlamBot hire in Sydney packages can be customised to include music tracks, slow-motion effects, cinematic filters, branded overlays, and other dynamic visual enhancements to elevate your videos. Whether you’re creating content for a corporate campaign, wedding memory, or fashion show highlight reel, our post-production options let you tailor every clip to suit your event’s unique vibe. The same customisation features are available for GlamBot hire in Melbourne and Brisbane, giving you the freedom to create content that captivates your audience wherever your event takes place.
